statements: DELETE FROM employee_performance_data WHERE employee_id = 100 AND performance_rating > 4.5
DELETE FROM employee_performance_data WHERE feedback LIKE '%improve%'
DELETE FROM performance_evaluations WHERE employee_id = 123 AND evaluation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM employee_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2021-06-30' AND feedback_text LIKE '%improve%';
DELETE FROM PerformanceReviews WHERE review_date < '2021-01-01' AND rating < 3;
DELETE FROM Goals WHERE deadline < '2022-06-30' AND status = 'Incomplete';
